item.description:
Dear Boston Karaoke Meetup Members:

I am pleased to announce our next Karaoke Meetup on November 13th 2010! It's at the Courtside Restaurant and Pub in Cambridge MA again. Courtside has an excellent selection of over 20,000 songs and many large screens for viewing lyrics. Whatever kind of music you enjoy, there will be something for you.

Our group is ideal for beginners as well as experienced singers. If you are new to Karaoke or just want to listen to the others sing, please feel free to join us. There will be no pressure for you to sing until you feel ready.

If you can't wait to grab that microphone, then you will feel right at home too. You can probably sing 3-4 songs during the course of the evening.

We have the Karaoke Lounge reserved just for us from 7-9PM so please try to get there by 7PM to get the most out of this Meetup.

Space is limited, please sign up as soon as possible.

Regards,
-Phil
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the Karaoke Lounge or call me at 617-429-6571.
item.name: Boston Karaoke Meetup - November 13, 2010
